description: Monitor newly executed processes, such as the W32tm.exe utility. (Citation: Microsoft W32Time May 2017) The Sysinternals Autoruns tool may also be used to analyze auto-starting locations, including DLLs listed as time providers. (Citation: TechNet Autoruns)

external_references.description: Mathers, B. (2017, May 31). Windows Time Service Tools and Settings. Retrieved March 26, 2018.
Russinovich, M. (2016, January 4). Autoruns for Windows v13.51. Retrieved June 6, 2016.
